forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 21 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this afternoon unfolds with a tableau of muted warmth beneath a mostly sunny sky. The temperature is set to hover near a comfortable 64 degrees, a welcome reprieve from the often overcast days that grace the city. A brisk west-southwest wind sweeps through the streets, creating a lively atmosphere with gusts that add a dash of animation to the air, whispering of the ocean's presence nearby. As the hours wane, the temperature will gently dip to around 62, though the freshness in the breeze will linger, enhancing that quintessential San Francisco charm.

Tonight, the city will transition to a mostly clear sky, cradling the warmth of a low around 53 — the perfect backdrop for evening pursuits. The wind continues its dance, inviting one to wrap a light sweater or jacket around the shoulders, especially as the night deepens and the coolness sets in. The lack of fog this afternoon offers an unspoiled view across the bay, making it an ideal time for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a serene moment in one of the many parks, where the setting sun paints the skyline in soft hues. Whether it’s savoring a quiet café scene or wandering through the eclectic streets, today holds the promise of an uncomplicated yet delightful day in this remarkable city.
